## Regard the code below and describe in what way(s) the idea of functional programming makes code easier to write and maintain.

```
x <- 1:10
funs <- list(
  sum = sum,
  mean = mean,
  median = median
)
lapply(funs, function(f) f(x, na.rm=TRUE))
```
